Select whether or not you want to let the public (visitors that are not logged-in) to view the following sections of your social network. In some cases (such as Profiles, Blogs, and Albums), if you have given them the option, your users will be able to make their pages private even though you have made them publically viewable here. For more permissions settings, please visit the General Settings page.

column1: Yes, the public can view videos unless they are made private.
column2: Yes, the public can view videos unless they are made private.

column1: No, the public cannot view videos.
column2: No, the public cannot view videos.
These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let members view videos? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members view videos? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: No, do not allow videos to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow videos to be viewed.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all videos, even private ones.

Do you want to let members create videos? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view videos, but only want certain levels to be able to create videos.

column1: No, do not allow video to be created.
column2: No, do not allow video to be created.
Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their video. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view videos.

Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their video. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on media.

This page lists all of the videos your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these videos and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific video. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the videos on your social network.

This email is sent to the owner of the video when the uploaded video has been processed and is ready for viewing.

[header]

Your video has been processed and is ready to be viewed. Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
This email is sent to the owner of the video when the uploaded video has failed to be processed.
Your video "[object_title]" has failed to process

[header]

We apologize, but there was a problem processing your video. The message was:
"[message]"

Please click the following link to view it:

http://[host][message_link]

[footer]
